::Killfest/EndBringer/Scyther/Greven/Demise/Goldeneye/Darkmouse::

Killfest growled, looking back at the flash on the horizon where the 
council base once was. It was gone, there was no question of that. He 
looked back at the battle, his eyes traveling over the charred 
terrain and the fighting bots. There was no longer a point to this. 

"Everyone let's get out of here. We need to find a base." Even as he 
said that over his comm, he had an idea where they could 
go. "DrillBit, tell the troops a place for all of us to meet up. 
We'll disguss getting a new base when we're there."

He began to back up, his foot catching on a root. He nearly fell 
over, but regained his balance and kept going.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer yelled as shots hit him and dented his armor, which was 
giving way by now. He recieved Killfest's order and jumped up, firing 
at Shockwave as he backed up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Scyther turned at Killfest's order, flying after the Predacon co-
Commander.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Greven threw Aerostreak off him, retreating after Killfest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Demise growled, stomping off after Killfest. He had just gotten to 
this battle, and he was not happy about retreating. He smashed his 
fist through a tree before resuming to walk after Killfest.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Goldeneye opened her eyes, groaning. She sat up and launched into the 
air. Recieving Killfest's transmission, she flew off toward DrillBit.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Shockwave:
> 
> 
> 
> The robot's sensors and sight kept track on where EndBringer had 
ended up 
> after Shockwave's missiles had blown.  He targeted the bush, firing 
off 25 
> rapid laser blasts from his nosecone at the patch of plant.
